code: import"./jogador.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function corDeFundoPorAno(ano){const anoInicio=1910;const ultimoAno=2025;const factor=Math.min(Math.max((ano-anoInicio)/(ultimoAno-anoInicio),0),1);const r=Math.round(192+factor*(255-192));const g=Math.round(192+factor*(255-192));const b=Math.round(192+factor*(255-192));return"rgb(".concat(r,", ").concat(g,", ").concat(b,")");}const Jogador=props=>{const baseCor=corDeFundoPorAno(Number(props.ano));const gradient="linear-gradient(to bottom, ".concat(baseCor,", #dfdfdf)");const cardJogadorFundoPorAno={background:gradient};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"jogador",style:cardJogadorFundoPorAno,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cabecalho",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:props.imagem,alt:props.nome})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"rodape",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:props.nome}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:props.posicaoSelecionada})]})]});};export default Jogador;
